Description:
Flat, Titled Block of Land & Ready to Built!!
Excellent opportunity to buy this beautiful block of land in the most popular estate of Kallo Estate.
Kallo Estate will become home to plenty of fantastic amenities, including schools, shopping, childcare, community centres and beautiful parks with amazing playgrounds, direct access to Hume Fwy & Donnybrook Train Station!
Buy now, Invest In Future Or To Build Your Perfect Family Home it's all your choice.
Please call Kalley Singh 0433 927 573 or Dave Singh 0430 327 172

Description:
WHAT AN OPPORTUNITY ON 2,023m2!
Only a short drive out of Melbourne's CBD is this fantastic opportunity to enjoy the best of both worlds. A peaceful country lifestyle and yet only 33 kilometres (approx.) from the CBD, plenty of room for the truck driver with easy access onto Hume Hwy, enjoy the convenience of a short drive to local shops, Donnybrook railway station, 5 min to Craigieburn's facilities & 15 min to Epping. Let the kids run free in the safety of your own private space of 2,023m2 (approx.) with the option to re-develop (Subject To Council Approval).

Description:
QUALITY AND NEAR NEW HOME !!!!!
This is a fantastic opportunity to purchase this beautiful home comprising of 4 bedrooms (master with ensuite), other 2
bedrooms with built in robes and the 4th bedroom/study, formal lounge, modern open plan kitchen, fully tiled bathroom, garage and decent size backyard. A home that is bound to appeal first home buyers and investors for the modern style it offers.
Additional features includes ducted heating, evaporative cooling, LED lighting, alarm system, high ceiling, porcelain tiles, blinds and stone bench top.
Cloverton (Stockland) Estate - Minutes away from Victoria's biggest master planned community in Melbourne's North that will offer parklands, schools, shopping centres, freeway access, close to train station and easy access to all amenities.
An opportunity that will not wait!

Description:
Elegance at its Best !!!!!
A visually exciting home defined by sophisticated neutral palettes and supreme attention to detail. Individuality is the homes hallmark, Combining accommodation and lifestyle, vision and style, form and function.This 4 Bedrooms plus Theatre gives attraction to families, Investors and First home buyers. A wide hallway adjacent to the Master bedroom with 2 walk in robes gives a lot of space to settle. Double vanity ensuite enhances the style. Entertaining is easy with a well detailed stone kitchen with quality stainless steel appliances, under mount sink and walk in pantry. Laundry with Linen Cupboards.
Remarkable casual living and dining areas situated in harmony with each other affording an effortless flow between the spaces.
Features are numerous & include Evaporative Cooling & Ducted Heating, down lights, quality window furnishings, double remote control garage with internal & rear access.Big Stacker door to the backyard.
DON'T WAIT JUST GRAB !!!!!!!!

Description:
Brand New Affordable Home
Amazing Opportunity to buy this brand new home in the most popular area of Cloverton Estate. The house comprises of 4 bedrooms, formal lounge, modern open plan kitchen, family area, laundry, two bathrooms and a double garage. The master has walk-in-robe with en suite and other bedrooms have built in robes.
Other features include led downlights, 900mm cooktop, rangehood, dishwasher, tone benchtop in kitchen, video intercom, security alarm, Fibre to the Home internet, secure internal access from garage and much more.
Situated in quiet location and only minutes from Hume freeway and Donnybrook train station.
* Take advantage of First Home Owners Grant
* No Progress Payments
PHOTOS ARE FOR ILLUSTRATIVE PURPOSES ONLY

Description:
Creek Facing For Magnificent Views & Parklands
A real opportunity that presents itself to purchase for savvy investors, families this huge block of land, 572m2 (approx.) in the heart of Kalkallo. The site of your dream home, this generous allotment presents a vast flat parcel with access to all town services, located in Cloverton Estates. Bordered on either side by streamlined commuting options, (Hume Highway access and the existing Rail service, you will be set to benefit from a wealth of proposed amenities including a vibrant town with shopping centre, health facilities, quality schooling options and so much more. Nestled in a tranquil urban fringe, amongst other quality-built homes, you are only minutes to Craigieburn Central, Epping shopping district, Donnybrook hotel and the Growling Frog golf course. A unique opportunity to create your dream lifestyle in the suburb of the future.
Please come and see me at one of our offices below to discuss your real estate needs.
219 High Street Thomastown
767 High Street Epping
510 Plenty Road Mill Park
952-954 High Street Reservoir
http://rata.harcourts.com.au/Home/statement-of-information

Description:
"GLEN LODGE" - 6533m² & HUGE RESIDENCE
Excellent opportunity within an investigation area, near Donnybrook and Craigieburn North Growth Areas.
Three street frontages, Mitchell, Patterson and McKenzie Streets. One street to the Hume Highway and two doors from Donnybrook Road. Township zone.
Huge double brick single storey residence in excellent condition throughout. Comprising 4 bedrooms, formal areas, theatre lounge, casual living areas with floor to ceiling windows and modern refurbished kitchen with state of the art appliances. Two bathrooms, heating and cooling and quality fittings throughout. Double garage with workshop. The land is fully fenced in three separate paddocks, cleared and very usable.
For further details and to arrange an inspection, please call Dianne Vissaritis on 0439 376 480.
PHOTO ID REQUIRED AT ALL INSPECTIONS
"We have obtained all information in this document from sources we believe to be reliable; however, we cannot guarantee its accuracy. Prospective purchasers are advised to carry out their own investigations…" For a Due Diligence Checklist go to:

Description:
This Is Where the Dream Begins
A terrific opportunity to secure your future in Kalkallo's thriving Cloverton Estate, this generous block of land is the perfect place to build your new family home.
Quiet & convenient with easy access to the area's planned community facilities & amenities, the block itself features uniform dimensions (approx 16m x 32m - 512sqm), minimal gradient & east-west alignment.
Parks & playgrounds, quality sports facilities, primary & secondary schools, as well as retail/cafe precincts highlight the scope of Cloverton's impressive masterplan, along with easy access to Donnybrook Station & the Hume Freeway.
All this just 40 kilometres from the heart of Melbourne - don't miss this one!

Description:
GREAT VALUE TITLED LAND IN KALLO!!!
Take advantage of this very rare opportunity to secure this titled North facing block of vacant land approximately 350sqm with 12.5m frontage located in one of North's most sought after up and coming locations. This block is titled and ready to build.
Kallo at Kalkallo – is approximately 35km from Melbourne's CBD - and is in the North's vibrant heartland and part of Victoria's biggest master planned community. Kallo is an exciting new community in Melbourne's north that will offer your family a world of choice – at home and in your surroundings, enjoy access to the best of what Craigieburn and Epping has to offer, with the Hume freeway and donnybrook train station right next door. Kallo gives your family the chance to live in a place that makes you feel like you can just escape, but at the same time find whatever you need at your fingertips. You will have array of choices in education, employment, shopping, parks and outdoor spaces. There has never been a better time to secure your family's future at Kallo. Also with all the Craigieburn facilities only minutes away including shops, schools, parkland and transport this parcel of land could make for the perfect new home site. This really is a great opportunity not to be missed!! Buy now before it's too late!!

Description:
Create Family moments in A Boutique Community
Cloverton Estate will become a centre of education north of Melbourne - with childcare, schools and tertiary facilities all proposed for the area. A major retail centre is being planned, while public transport and medical services will provide everything the community needs.
Your Brand new Family home is under Construction now, and is waiting for you.
Surrounded with endless parkland, and miles of Merri Creek Trails for your enjoyment.
This Quality Built Modern Home is Designed to accommodate the demands of the astute buyer or growing families. Boasting a well-designed floor plan that features four spacious bedrooms all with built in robes, master with walk in robe and an en suite, second living area with a bulk head ceiling feature, large state of the art kitchen with high quality - SMEG Italian Made appliances and finishes.Well thought out home design, where small inclusions offered make the biggest difference.This Home will provide you a maximum enjoyment with a free flowing open plan meals and living area, giving direct outdoor access to your covered alfresco area.
Luxury inclusions; SMEG appliances, gas ducted heating, evaporative cooling, down lights, stone bench tops, alarm, Double car lockup garage with access to rear and much more...
Please call Jill on 0455 047 009

SOLD BY KALLEY SINGH & DAVE SINGH!!
Land for Sale - 540 SQM in Cloverton Estate
48 Cooney Circuit Cloverton Estate Kalkallo
Smart Massive Block in A Great Location
This vacant 540m2 block is perfect to build your dream home. With a 17-metre frontage, this block is suitable for an array of home designs and provides the perfect opportunity for you to build your family home in this sought-after Estate.
Cloverton (Stockland) Estate - Minutes away from Victoria's biggest master planned community in Melbourne's North that will offer parklands, schools, shopping centres, freeway access, close to train station and easy access to all amenities. An opportunity that will not wait!
For further information please Call Kalley Singh 0433 927 573

Description:
GREAT VALUE TITLED LAND IN KALLO!!!
Take advantage of this very rare opportunity to secure this TITLED block of vacant land with 13.73m frontage opposite the proposed shopping centre, located in one of North's most sought upcoming locations. Kallo at Kalkallo – is approx 35km from Melbourne's CBD - and is in the North's vibrant heartland and part of Victoria's biggest master planned community. Kallo is an exciting new community in Melbourne's north that will offer your family a world of choice – at home and in your surroundings, enjoy access to the best of what craigieburn and epping has to offer, with the hume freeway and donnybrook train station right next door. Kallo gives your famliy the chance to live in a place that makes you feel like you can just escape, but at the same time find whatever you need at your finger tips. You will have array of choices in education, employment, shopping, parks and outdoor spaces. There has never been a better time to secure your family's future at Kallo. Also With all the craigieburn facilities only minutes away including shops, schools, parkland and transport this parcel of land could make for the perfect new home site. This really is a great opportunity not to be missed!! Buy now before it's too late!!

Description:
As Good As Brand New
Situated in The Kallo Estate is this stunning family home which is ready for you to simply move in and enjoy. Comprising of 3 large bedrooms (ensuite to main), open plan kitchen/meals/family, separate lounge and an alfresco entertaining area. Easy access to the Hume Freeway and close to the Donnybrook train station, local parkland, sporting ovals, the Kalkallo hotel & future local shops this property is one not to miss for the first home buyer or investor.
Featuring:
- 3 bedrooms with BIR’s
- Ensuite
- Ducted Heating & SS Cooling
- Alfresco Entertaining Area
- Double Garage (Remote and Internal Access)
- Front and rear landscaping
- Spacious walk in pantry
